titleStmt.title: Sir Francis Drake his honorable lifes commendation, and his tragicall deathes lamentation.
titleStmt.author: Fitz-Geffry, Charles, 1575?-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to bee solde in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: The poems on A3r,v are signed "R.R." and "F.R.". Variant 1: poems signed "Richard Rous" and "Francis Rous". Variant 2: with an additional leaf following A4, with a Latin poem by T. Michelborne.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
